title: Cultural Bereavement: Naming the Grief Refugees May Feel
description: There is a name for the specific type of grief that both refugees and migrants experience. It’s called “cultural bereavement.”
dc:creator: Alisha Haridasani Gupta
media:credit: Theo Stroomer for The New York Times
media:description: Tamara Plieshkova reunited with her granddaughter in Colorado after escaping the war in Ukraine in September.
